DatingApplication

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatingApplication.Customer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Advertiser, Responder

    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class that handles the information of Customer.

      A parameter that holds the login details of the customer.

        A parameter that holds the income of the customer.

        protected Login login
        A parameter that holds the login details of the customer.

      • denomination

        protected java.lang.String denomination
        A parameter that holds denomination of the customer. i.e. whether they are a responder or an Advertiser.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer()
        A Default constructor that is called upon when a Customer object is created. The constructor initializes the parameters to the default program values.

      • Customer

        public Customer(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String gender,
                int age,
                int income,
                java.lang.String denomination,
                Login login)
         throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                DatingApplication.UnknownOpException,
                java.util.InputMismatchException
        An initializer Constructor that initializes the Customer Object to user-defined Values. Throws some exception that must be caught.
        Parameters:
        firstName - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the first name of the denomination
        lastName - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the last name of the denomination
        gender - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the gender of the denomination
        age - an integer parameter set by the user, indicates the age of the denomination
        income - an integer parameter set by the user, indicates the income of the denomination
        denomination -
        login - a Login object that holds the login details of the denomination
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        UnknownOpException
        java.util.InputMismatchException
